stimulusHtml: Which of the following expressions gives the volume of the solid?

features.html: The base of a solid is the region bounded by a portion of the graph of  y = sin ( π 2 x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@405C@  and the x-axis, as shown in the figure above. For the solid, each cross section perpendicular to the x-axis is a rectangle of height 3.

choicesHtml: ∫ 0 2 3 sin( π 2 x )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4501@

∫ 0 2 3 sin 2 ( π 2 x )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4613@

∫ 0 2 3 πsin( π 2 x )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46BE@

∫ 0 2 3 π sin 2 ( π 2 x )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47D0@
